borough: London Borough of Hammersmith and Fulham
description: Variation of condition 2 of planning permission ref: 2024/00727/FUL granted 28th May 2024 for the 'Partial demolition of the 5 storey rear back addition, erection of a replacement part four-storey (double height ground floor with three floors above) and part single storey rear extension; further excavation and enlargement of the existing basement; installation of a new Juliet balcony at first floor level to the rear elevation; reduce the full height brick wall to the front of the property and to reinstate the historic gates and railings; associated internal and external alterations' to allow amendments to the approved drawings to include: alterations to the northern (rear) elevation to change the approved Crittall-style doors with traditional timber-framed French doors, with glazing to each side and above, alterations to the fenestration of fourth floor rear extension to include changing the timber cladding finish to painted render finish to western elevation, and feature changes to the rear (northern) and southern (side) elevation and alterations to the roof of fourth floor rear extension.
